Detailed Description

template<typename T, class ALLOCATOR = CDS_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR>
class cds::map::split_list::static_bucket_table< T, ALLOCATOR >

Static bucket table.

Non-resizeable bucket table. The capacity of table (max bucket count) is defined in the constructor call.

Template parameter

T defines type of table node.
ALLOCATOR - memory allocator template, default is std::allocator

Constructor & Destructor Documentation
